paper.title: The Influence of Risk Factors on the Dynamics of Gross Regional Product in Conditions of Clustering of the Economy (On the Example of the Nizhny Novgorod Region)
paper.abstract: The purpose of this study is to develop a model of multivariate analysis of regional risk that takes into account both intraregional and global financial and economic determinants. Regional risk as a specific concept that limits the effectiveness of the development of the regional economic system in conditions of clustering is the object of research in this study. Multivariate modeling of regional risk based on correlation-regression analysis is the subject of research. Systematic assessment of risk factors is carried out using an economic-statistical model, which is an extended version of the Cobb-Douglas function. Its arguments include additional factors that determine the pace and risks of development of any region. The most significant deviations of the actual values of the elasticity coefficients of the model from the reference proportions highlight the most significant factors of regional risk. A model for assessing the influence of factors of intraregional and external financial and economic risk on the dynamics of the gross regional product is proposed. The proportions of the elasticity coefficients of the model are reasoned. It was tested on the data of the Nizhny Novgorod Region for 2010-2019, recommendations to minimize the level of risk in the context of clustering the economy of this region were formulated. The model allows highlighting risk factors from the point of view of the dynamics of the gross regional product, ranking them according to the level of significance, and, on this basis, developing recommendations for minimizing the risks of development of the regional economy.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究区域风险的多变量分析模型，关注的是区域经济发展中的风险因素及其对地区生产总值的影响，并未涉及衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理等金融研究领域。
